text: "Over and Over'" is a R&B;/country rap song by American rapper Nelly featuring country music singer Tim McGraw. It is the second single from his fourth studio album Suit. The song was released on October 12, 2004 in the United States and on February 28, 2005 in the United Kingdom. The song reached number 1 on the Australian Singles, Irish Singles, UK Singles, and U.S. Billboard Top 40 Mainstream charts. It also reached number 2 on the Canadian Singles Chart, 3 on the Romanian Singles Chart, 3 on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100, 7 on the U.S. Billboard Hot Rap Tracks and 51 on the U.S. Billboard Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs chart. == References == Category:Nelly songs Category:2004 songs Category:Country songs Category:R&B; songs Category:Tim McGraw songs
title: Over and Over
